item.title: I-76 East Exit 92 Offramp at BL-76/US-6/To US-34
item.description: I-76 East Exit 92 offramp at BL-76/US-6/To US-34 in Morgan County. Turn left for BL-76/US-6 East; right for BL-76 West/To US-34. The sign incorrectly shows To US-6, instead of just US-6.

item.title: CO-71 North Approaching US-34
item.description: CO-71 north approaching US-34. Turn right for US-34 to Sterling and Wray; left for US-34 West/CO-71 North to Brush. CO-71 joins US-34 west through Brush.
